special_text:
First mate – Your starting deck contains “The[i] Fell Reaper[/i]” and each nonland card in your starting deck targets or has an ability that targets.
[+3]: Target opponent exiles a card from their hand or a nonland permanent they control. If that player is cursed, you may play that card until end of turn.
[-3]: Captain Crain deals 3 damage to each creature and each non-Crain planeswalker. Create three Treasure tokens.
[-13]: Each cursed opponent loses the game.
